name: Dirt Cake II
author: DARLENEL
summary: Kids love dirt. Can be made in a large flower pot or 2 small flower pots.
ingredients: 1 (20 ounce) package chocolate sandwich cookies with creme filling
2 (3.9 ounce) packages instant chocolate pudding mix
1 (12 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
directions: Put the cookies in a food processor and process until they become fine crumbs
In a large bowl, combine the butter or margarine, cream cheese, confectioners sugar and vanilla flavoring
Beat on low speed to mix then beat on medium speed until smooth
Add the chocolate pudding mix and milk to the bowl
Beat on low speed to combine
Fold the whipped topping into the pudding mixture with a rubber spatula
Assemble in the ungreased 9x13 inch pan in layers as follows:  first layer, 1/3 cookie crumbs;  second layer, 1/2 pudding mixture;  third layer, 1/3 cookie crumbs;  fifth layer, 1/3 cookie crumbs
Tuck the ends of gummy worms in the cookie "dirt"
Be sure to have a worm on each piece
Chill for at least 3 hours before serving
Cut into 15 squares, or serve with a clean garden trowel or a toy sand shovel if serving in the flower pot
